title: WTB 1911 New York Giants Sporty Postal postcard
author: T206Jim

posts.post_title: WTB 1911 New York Giants Sporty Postal postcard
posts.post_content: I am looking to complete my Sporty Postal "set" of three postcards.   I am looking to acquire the 1911 New York Giants postcard.  If you have one please let me know.
